filter.name: Escalated
filter.sql: Manager not like '^.*Watch$' and SuppressEscl < 4 and SuppressEscl > 0

filter.name: Information
filter.sql: Manager not like '^.*Watch$' and SuppressEscl < 4 and Type = 13

filter.name: Last10Mins
filter.sql: ( ( LastOccurrence >= getdate - 600 ) and ( Manager not like '^.*Watch$' ) ) and ( Severity > 0 )

filter.name: TaskList
filter.sql: Manager not like '^.*Watch$' and SuppressEscl < 4 and TaskList = 1
